name: Run Selenium C# Automation Tests

on:
  push:
    branches: ["main"]
  pull_request:
    branches: ["main"]

jobs:
  build-and-test:
    runs-on: windows-latest

    steps:
      - name: Checkout repo
        uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Setup .NET
        uses: actions/setup-dotnet@v4
        with:
          dotnet-version: '7.0.x'   # change if your project uses 6.0 or 8.0

      - name: Install Chrome
        uses: browser-actions/setup-chrome@v1

      - name: Restore
        run: dotnet restore AutomationDemo.sln

      - name: Build
        run: dotnet build AutomationDemo.sln --configuration Release --no-restore

      - name: Run tests
        run: dotnet test AutomationDemo.sln --no-build --verbosity normal
